About Me

Frontend Developer


It's not easy to become a Developer Frontend, requiring the habit of coding so that you can practice creativity. Focus is needed for tenacity and high curiosity. I come from Jatisari Purwodadi Pasuruan. I want to be a Frontend Developer. I want to develop my work that I have worked on at Vocational School. Do not want to stop here to add experience, I am an intern at PT. Inagata Technosmith. Not giving up, thinking forward is the key to success that a fighter must have.
